lb:
During an [Airstrike], all Squadrons will launch 10 more planes.
Coward upgraded to Level 2.

Bombers will drop their payloads before being engaged by enemy Anti-Air fire.
Tea Time upgraded to Level 2.

During Day Battle, increases all damage by 30%.
Coward upgraded to Level 3.

Increases aircraft reserves for all categories by 50 aircraft each.
Tea Time upgraded to Level 3.

During Day Battle, gains the ability to launch an [Airstrike] immediately that deals 50% damage. This attack will not incur any plane loss.
Coward upgraded to Level 4.

skills.name: Class Skill
skills.text:
Airstrikes: Can launch attacks from the map and in battle, has infinite range, reload time when used on map: 60s in battle: 25
Reconnaissance: Planes can be sent when on the map to reveal the fog of war, reload time: 10s

skills.name: Erosion Torpedoes - Air (破艇魚雷・空)
text: When [Torpedo Bomber] hits a target, 100% chance to inflict [Flooding], lowering target speed by 50%, lasts 5 seconds
After [Flooding] ends, target will take 140% of Courageous's Firepower in damage.

skills.name: Inspiring Presence (鼓舞の心)
text: Increases [Airstrike] damage of the Flagship by 20%

comment: Forerunner to the other Imperial aircraft carriers. Looks serious, but screws up in important times. Despite having the most experience, Courageous is always somewhat tense, and easily gets angry. She also gets stomachaches easily...
